DataElement.preferredName: CHAMPS Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults 32.2 During Past 4 Weeks Swim Moderately or Fast Total Hours per Week Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response about how many total hours a week they swam moderately or fast, during the past 4 weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: CHAMPS Activities Questionnaire for Older Adults During Past 4 Weeks Swim Moderately or Fast
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-report physical activity questionnaire for older men and women, developed to evaluate the outcomes of the Community Healthy Activities Model Program for Seniors (CHAMPS), an intervention to increase physical activity._At some point in a given period of time._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A question about whether an individual did any moderate or fast swimming.

ReferenceDocuments.name: How many TOTAL hours a week d
ReferenceDocuments.description: How many TOTAL hours a week did you usually do it?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
